description: This is a Java source file defining a REST controller named HelloController for a Spring Boot application. It provides basic endpoints such as a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller class providing basic endpoints for the productsbackend application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to the Swagger UI.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns application information.
